name: Install Docker
description: Install Docker in LXC container. Supports both Alpine Linux (apk) and Debian/Ubuntu (apt). Docker runs as root in the container.

parameters.name: OS Type
parameters.description: Operating system type: 'alpine' for Alpine Linux (apk) or 'debian'/'ubuntu' for Debian/Ubuntu (apt). Auto-detected from /etc/os-release if available.

commands.description: Install Docker using the appropriate package manager (apk for Alpine, apt for Debian/Ubuntu)
